EmailTemplate.name: 201709_EMEAI_Email_Defence_JAC Eblast_JC.201709_EMEAI_Email_Defence_JAC Eblast_J
EmailTemplate.subject: First Middle East Service Centre for T53 Engines
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | DEFENSE & SPACE NEW SERVICE FOR T53 ENGINES Dear Customer
Honeywell is pleased to announce that your T53 engines can now be serviced in Jordan. It's our first dedicated T53 service center in the Middle East and Africa region. Jordanian Aeronautical Systems Co. (JAC) will provide both military and commercial operators with localized repairs and maintenance options. Honeywell is committed to supporting our customers, and our agreement with JAC will provide local repair capabilities, quicker turnaround and less downtime – to keep you flying longer. Please contact us to learn more or schedule service.
NEED MORE INFORMATION <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201709_EMEAI_Email_Defence_JAC-Eblast_JC_201709_EMEAI_Email_Defence_JAC-Eblast_LandingPage.html]]>
Mosab Alkubaisy Director Middle East and Africa
